name: Aim lock
author: Pi
description: Allows any animal to have mahi mahi's target locking ability. Press A to lock on to a target.

name: Aim overlay
author: Pi
description: Hold down the Ctrl key to see a red line that helps you aim

name: AutoShake
author: TheJ
description: Press V to toggle autoshake (sends packets to server to imitate mouse shaking forward backward doesnt alter rotation) (can be used to walk around invisible as GPO)

name: Auto spin
author: Pi
description: Spin really fast without breaking your arms. Hold Z to activate.

name: Boost hacks
author: Pi
description: Ctrl+click to do a charged boost. Alt+click to do a weak charged boost. Ctrl+shift+click to do a special boost combo (only for some animals)

name: I see dead fish
author: Pi
description: Show all ghosts. This is the only way to see ghosts without becoming a ghost because saying "I see dead fish" no longer works.

name: Mute slash commands
author: Pi
description: Brings back /mute and /unmute so you can mute annoying people. Works the same way as before.

name: No camera clamp
author: Pi
description: Camera position clamp is removed. Your animal will always be centered on the screen.

name: No invisible animals
author: Pi
description: No more low opacity or invisible animals. These include tiger shark, barracuda, anglerfish, salamander, and many more. Also allows you to see animals that are hiding in props.

name: No zoom limit
author: Pi
description: Zoom clamp is removed. You can zoom in or out as far as you want.

name: Quick disconnect
author: Pi
description: Press Ctrl + Shift + Q to disconnect from any server instantly.

name: X-ray
author: Pi
description: Allows you to see hiding and digging animals in the game
